title: Nighttime Pierrot

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, each player is assigned a costume. Costume are short descriptors, up to the host's discretion, such as "Butterfly" or "Red".
- A full list of costumes is made available alongside the playlist, but players do not know which player has which costume nor which costume they have.
- Whenever a player dies or is removed form the game, the costume they had is revealed.
- You know which costume you have.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each day before a full moon, choose neon or moonlight. If you don't, moonlight is chosen automatically. Once you choose a mode three times, you may no longer choose the other.
> *Neon* — The next night, players choose costumes as targets instead of players.
> *Moonlight* — The next night, players are forced to use abilities and forced target themselves if able.
- Dance two other players each night, transporting them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Your goal depends on which of neon or moonlight you chose more of. You can't win if it's even.
> *Neon* — Be visited by at least two different players, die at night, and see the Town lose the game.
> *Moonlight* — Visit at least two players who also visit you, and survive until the end of the game.
